name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Customer Support Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions. Highly proficient in programming languages and technologies including **Java**, **C**, **C++**, **Android**, and **iOS** development with tools like **Android Studio** and **XCode**. Strong background in application and system security, focusing on **Cyber Security** to ensure robust and secure software implementations. Excellent communication skills and a collaborative team player with proven resourcefulness and flexibility in dynamic environments.

Additionally, experienced in modern frameworks and architectures such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. Expertise in deploying cloud-native applications on platforms like **Azure** and **AWS** and adept at building enterprise software that meets compliance frameworks like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about leveraging technical skills to enhance customer support and deliver impactful solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Demonstrated excellent communication skills while collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver enterprise software implementations within the allocated time frame of **9** months.
•	Served as a team player, providing exemplary support for customers utilizing application security features, ensuring compliance with industry standards and practices.
•	Exercised flexibility and resourcefulness to troubleshoot and resolve issues in software applications, enhancing user satisfaction scores by **15%**.
•	Utilized organizational skills to manage and prioritize multiple support tickets, maintaining an average response time of **8** hours, significantly improving customer experience.
•	Proactively identified and improved security measures in desktop and mobile applications developed with **Java**, **C++**, **Android**, and **iOS**, resulting in a **20%** reduction in security incidents.
•	Applied knowledge in System Security, Network Security, and Cyber Security to consult on best practices for clients seeking to enhance their application security.
•	Leveraged the ability to self-start and independently drive projects that improved system performance and security.
•	Engaged with customers to gather feedback and suggest improvements, helping shape product features aligned with user needs and industry shifts.

Provided excellent communication and support for customers by troubleshooting technical issues related to **C** and **Java**, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.
Demonstrated resourcefulness in resolving complex problems with **Android** and **iOS** applications, contributing to a seamless user experience.
Actively collaborated as a team player, coordinating with cross-functional teams to implement and enhance security measures across applications, focusing on **System Security**, **Network Security**, and **Application Security**.
Maintained and improved enterprise software implementations by leveraging **Excellent Organizational Skills** to manage project timelines and deliverables effectively.
Monitored and assessed application performance, employing flexibility in adapting solutions for different environments and user needs, thereby supporting user adoption by over **1,000** clients.
Developed and executed training sessions for clients, enhancing their understanding of security practices and application features, resulting in a **30%** reduction in support tickets.
Utilized advanced problem-solving techniques to identify security vulnerabilities, contributing to a **15%** decrease in security incidents over **6 months**.

Utilized **C**, **C++**, and **Java** to develop and maintain enterprise-level customer support applications, ensuring scalability and responsiveness to meet business needs.
Implemented **System Security**, **Network Security**, and **Application Security** measures that enhanced the overall security posture of the support platform, protecting sensitive customer data from breaches.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve issues in real-time, demonstrating strong **Excellent Communication** skills to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Streamlined support processes through the integration of automated solutions in **Android** and **iOS** applications, improving response times by **40%** and increasing customer satisfaction ratings.
Engaged in **Enterprise Software Implementation**, adapting solutions to fit diverse customer environments while ensuring minimal disruption during the transition period.
Fostered a culture of **Team Player** approach, facilitating knowledge sharing among team members and encouraging a resourceful mindset for problem-solving.
Maintained rigorous organizational skills by managing project timelines and deliverables effectively to ensure on-time completion of support initiatives.
Demonstrated flexibility to adapt to changing requirements, showcasing a **Self-Starter** attitude by proactively identifying areas for improvement within the support framework.
